author: mpoeschl
msg: Torque.master: set pool.validationQuery using a filter (replacing @VALIDATION_QUERY@)
this allows to define the validationQuery in profiles and conf/database/xyz files (as the query depends on the used db this is needed to allow using the jdbc2pool as default)
add validationQuery property to all profiles and conf/database/xyz files
